Parameters:

session (Str) – session

Returns:

code_General.logics.organizationLogics.sendEventViaWebsocket(orgID, baseURL, baseHeader, eventName, args)¶

Send events to the respective websockets.

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – ID of that organization

  • baseURL (str) – stuff for Auth0

  • baseHeader (str) – stuff for Auth0

  • eventName (str) – stuff for frontend

  • args (str) – other arguments

Returns:

True or exception

Return type:

Bool or exception

code_General.logics.organizationLogics.logicsForOrganizationsAssignRole(validatedInput, request)¶
code_General.logics.organizationLogics.getOrganizationName(session, orgID, baseURL, baseHeader)¶

Get Name of the Organization

Parameters:

  • orgID (str) – the id of the current organization

  • baseURL (str) – start of the url

  • baseHeader (Dict) – Header with basic stuff

Returns:

If successful, name of organization, error if not

Return type:

str or error
